text: John Burley Swainson (July 31, 1925 â€“ May 13, 1994) was a Canadian-American politician and lawyer. He was the 42nd Governor of Michigan from 1961 until 1963. He was Lieutenant Governor from 1959 until 1961. He was a Democrat. Swainson died on May 13, 1994 in Manchester, Michigan from a heart attack, aged 68. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Canadian lawyers Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Michigan Category:Lawyers from Michigan Category:Lieutenant Governors of Michigan Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Politicians from Windsor, Ontario Category:State legislators of the United States
title: John Swainson
